name: Nyyk's Bizarre Adventure
description:
Welcome to NYYK’S BIZZARE ADVENTURE! Nyyk has woken up in a mysterious burrow, surrounded by trees that seem keen on trapping it underground… forever. Fight back the tree roots and help Nyyk find its way out of this place.

GameJam 2023 submission

Code: https://github.com/chees-e/gamejam23

Game is in main.rar

Submission in submission.rar
